location: Songjiang Road, near Xingtian Temple MRT (238m) and Minquan-Songjiang Road station (48m)
notes: 2BR/1LR apartment on 1F of 5-story building with elevator. Pet-friendly, allows cooking, has balcony. Amenities include AC, fridge, washer, furniture. Very convenient location near MRT stations and markets. Unable to assess modernity or baby safety concerns (balcony railings, sharp corners) without viewing actual interior photos.
